name: Entanglemages
description:
The Mages are quantumly entangled, but they are going to move in an inverted synchrony. Good luck!

Use the arrows to control the mages and avoid the obstacles:

- Right and left to accelerate and decelerate

- Up for jumping when you see a stone

- Down for sliding when you see a tree

A game made in the 2015 Quantum Game Jam.

Credits:Game Design:

- Daniel Savoia
- Gabriel Ishizaki
- Lucas Santos
- Marina Vasques

Art:

Programming:
